description:
Jim Gaffigan (Quality Time, American Dreamer) tells Justin that he would much rather be thought of as a funny comedian, rather that a clean comedian you can listen to with your kid. Justin and Jim discuss how important it is to feel content where your life is, and to have friends that ground you.
